description.narrative: Communities Forward Program by supporting a community-based comprehensive prevention and HIV counseling and testing (HCT) program in order to reduce HIV incidence. An important focus is to increase the capacity of government organizations to design, implement, manage and evaluate strategic communication interventions for greater effectiveness in HIV prevention. In alignment with the NSP and the PFIP, the goal of the program is to contribute to a sustained 50% reduction in new HIV infections by 2017.

participating-org.narrative: Johns Hopkins Health and Education in South Africa
